Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase
HMaster
          HMaster is the "master server" for HBase.
 

Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master
HMaster
          HMaster is the "master server" for HBase.
LogCleanerDelegate
          Interface for the log cleaning function inside the master.
MetaRegion
          Describes a meta region and its server
NotAllMetaRegionsOnlineException
          Thrown when an operation requires the root and all meta regions to be online
RegionManager
          Class to manage assigning regions to servers, state of root and meta, etc.
RegionServerOperationListener
          Listener for regionserver events in master.
RegionServerOperationQueue
          Keeps up the queue of RegionServerOperations.
RegionServerOperationQueue.ProcessingResultCode
          Enums returned by RegionServerOperationQueue.process();
ServerManager
          The ServerManager class manages info about region servers - HServerInfo, load numbers, dying servers, etc.
